children.backgroundColor: {{(function (score) { var hex = "#ffffff"; switch(Math.round(score)){ 	case 1: 	hex = "#F24236"; 	break; 	case 2: 	hex = "#E9724C"; 	break; 	case 3: 	hex = "#F2E94E"; 	break; 	case 4: 	hex = "#DFFFD6"; 	break; 	case 5: 	hex = "#5EF38C"; 	break; 	 } return hex; })((Rating1.value + Rating1.value + Rating3.value )/3)}}

children.text: How does your day look today?
